queries.question: Smerovi koji traju 4 godine
Smerovi koji traju 3 godine
Smerovi koji traju duŽe od 3 godine
Smerovi koji traju kraće od 4 godine

queries.query:
PREFIX ns1: <http://example.org/course/>
SELECT ?program (COUNT(?course) AS ?courseCount)
WHERE {
 ?program ns1:has_course ?course.
  ?course ns1:has_content ?content.
FILTER(
    CONTAINS(LCASE(?content), "комплексно") ||
    CONTAINS(LCASE(?content), "напредн")
  )}
GROUP BY ?program
ORDER BY DESC(?courseCount)
Limit 5
queries.question: Koji smerovi sadrže teže i napredne koncepte programiranja?

queries.query:
PREFIX ns1: <http://example.org/course/>

SELECT ?program(COUNT(?course ) AS ?courseCount)
WHERE {
 ?program ns1:has_course ?course .
  ?course ns1:has_knowledge_area <http://example.org/ka/CE-CAE_Circuits_and_Electronics>
}
GROUP BY ?program 
ORDER BY DESC(?courseCount)
Limit 5
queries.question: Koji smerovi se bave elektrotehnikom?
Koliko godina traje smer SIIT?
Da li postoji smer _____?

queries.query:
PREFIX ns1: <http://example.org/course/>
SELECT ?program (COUNT(?course) AS ?courseCount)
WHERE {
 ?program ns1:has_course ?course.
  ?course ns1:has_content ?content.
FILTER(
    CONTAINS(LCASE(?content), "робот") ||
    CONTAINS(LCASE(?content), "хардвер")
  )}
GROUP BY ?program
ORDER BY DESC(?courseCount)
Limit 5
queries.question: Na kojem smeru ću imati priliku da programiram robote i da se bolje upoznam sa hardverom?

queries.query:
PREFIX ns1: <http://example.org/course/>
SELECT ?program (COUNT(?course) AS ?courseCount)
WHERE {
 ?program ns1:has_course ?course.
  ?course ns1:has_content ?content.
FILTER(
    CONTAINS(LCASE(?content), "тимск") ||
    CONTAINS(LCASE(?content), "у тиму") ||
    CONTAINS(LCASE(?content), "груп")
  )}
GROUP BY ?program
ORDER BY ASC(?courseCount)
Limit 5
queries.question: Koji smer je dobar za samostalno istraživanje i učenje bez rada u timu?

queries.query:
PREFIX ns1: <http://example.org/course/>

SELECT ?program (COUNT(DISTINCT ?knowledge_area) AS ?knowledgeCount)
WHERE {
  ?program ns1:has_course ?course .
  ?course ns1:has_knowledge_area ?knowledge_area .
}
GROUP BY ?program 
ORDER BY DESC(?knowledgeCount)
LIMIT 5
queries.question: Koji smer nudi širok spektar znanja a ne usku specijalizaciju?

queries.query:
PREFIX ns1: <http://example.org/course/>
SELECT ?program (COUNT(?course) AS ?courseCount)
WHERE {
 ?program ns1:has_course ?course.
  ?course ns1:has_content ?content.
FILTER(
    CONTAINS(LCASE(?content), "робот") || 
    CONTAINS(LCASE(?content), "актуатор")
  )}
GROUP BY ?program
ORDER BY DESC(?courseCount)
Limit 5
queries.question: Koji smerovi su vezani za ucenje robotike?

queries.query:
PREFIX ns1: <http://example.org/course/>
SELECT ?program (COUNT(?course) AS ?courseCount)
WHERE {
 ?program ns1:has_course ?course.
  ?course ns1:has_content ?content.
FILTER(
    CONTAINS(LCASE(?content), "plc") || 
    CONTAINS(LCASE(?content), "плц")
  )}
GROUP BY ?program
ORDER BY DESC(?courseCount)
Limit 5
queries.question: Na kojim smerovima se uči PLC programiranje?

queries.query:
PREFIX ns1: <http://example.org/course/>
SELECT ?program (COUNT(?course) AS ?courseCount)
WHERE {
  ?program ns1:has_course ?course.
  ?course ns1:has_content ?content.
  FILTER(
    CONTAINS(LCASE(?content), "analiza podataka") || 
    CONTAINS(LCASE(?content), "vizuelizacija podataka") || 
    CONTAINS(LCASE(?content), "анализа података") || 
    CONTAINS(LCASE(?content), "визуелизација података")
  )
}
GROUP BY ?program
ORDER BY DESC(?courseCount)
LIMIT 5
queries.question: Koji programi pokrivaju tehnologije i alate za analizu i vizuelizaciju podataka?

queries.query:
PREFIX ns1: <http://example.org/course/>

SELECT ?program (COUNT(?course) AS ?courseCount)
WHERE {
  ?program ns1:has_course ?course.
  ?course ns1:has_knowledge_area ?knowledgeArea.
  FILTER(
    ?knowledgeArea IN (
      <http://example.org/ka/AL-Algorithms_and_Complexity>,
      <http://example.org/ka/CE-CAE_Computing_Algorithms>,
      <http://example.org/ka/Programming,_Data_Structures,_and_Algorithms_(PDA)>
    )
  )
}
GROUP BY ?program
ORDER BY DESC(?courseCount)
LIMIT 5
queries.question: Koji smerovi pružaju duboko razumevanje za implementaciju algoritama u industriji?

queries.query:
PREFIX ns1: <http://example.org/course/>

SELECT ?program (COUNT(?course) AS ?courseCount)
WHERE {
  ?program ns1:has_course ?course.
  ?course ns1:has_knowledge_area ?knowledgeArea.
  ?course ns1:has_content ?content.
  FILTER(
    ?knowledgeArea IN (
      <http://example.org/ka/Machine_Learning_(ML)>,
      <http://example.org/ka/Big_Data_Systems_(BDS)>
    ) || 
    CONTAINS(LCASE(?content), "obrada prirodnog jezika") ||
    CONTAINS(LCASE(?content), "обрада природног језика")
  )
}
GROUP BY ?program
ORDER BY DESC(?courseCount)
LIMIT 5
queries.question: Koji smerovi se bave razvojem naprednih tehnika za obrada prirodnog jezika (NLP)?

queries.query:
PREFIX ns1: <http://example.org/course/>

SELECT ?program (COUNT(?course) AS ?projectCount)
WHERE {
  ?program ns1:has_course ?course.
  ?course ns1:has_content ?content.
  FILTER(
    CONTAINS(LCASE(?content), "projek") ||
    CONTAINS(LCASE(?content), "пројек")
  )
}
GROUP BY ?program
ORDER BY DESC(?projectCount)
LIMIT 5
queries.question: Koji su smerovi koji imaju puno projekata?

queries.query:
PREFIX ns1: <http://example.org/course/>

SELECT ?program (COUNT(?course) AS ?relevantCourseCount)
WHERE {
  ?program ns1:has_course ?course.
  ?course ns1:has_content ?content.
  FILTER(
    CONTAINS(LCASE(?content), "projek") ||
    CONTAINS(LCASE(?content), "пројекат") ||
    CONTAINS(LCASE(?content), "tim") ||
    CONTAINS(LCASE(?content), "тим") ||
    CONTAINS(LCASE(?content), "timski") ||
    CONTAINS(LCASE(?content), "тимски")
  )
}
GROUP BY ?program
HAVING (COUNT(?course) > 5)
ORDER BY DESC(?relevantCourseCount)
queries.question: Koji smerovi uključuju aktivan timski rad sa drugim studentima?

queries.query:
PREFIX ns1: <http://example.org/course/>

SELECT ?program (COUNT(?course) AS ?relevantCourseCount)
WHERE {
  ?program ns1:has_course ?course.
  ?course ns1:has_content ?content.
  FILTER(
    CONTAINS(LCASE(?content), "projek") ||
    CONTAINS(LCASE(?content), "пројекат") ||
    CONTAINS(LCASE(?content), "tim") ||
    CONTAINS(LCASE(?content), "тим") ||
    CONTAINS(LCASE(?content), "timski") ||
    CONTAINS(LCASE(?content), "тимски")
  )
}
GROUP BY ?program
HAVING (COUNT(?course) > 5)
ORDER BY DESC(?relevantCourseCount)
queries.question: Koji smerovi imaju timske projekte?

queries.query:
PREFIX ns1: <http://example.org/course/>

SELECT ?program 
       (COUNT(?practicalCourse) AS ?practicalCount)
       (COUNT(?theoreticalCourse) AS ?theoreticalCount)
       ((COUNT(?practicalCourse) - COUNT(?theoreticalCourse)) AS ?practicalDominance)
WHERE {
  ?program ns1:has_course ?course.
  ?course ns1:has_content ?content.
  OPTIONAL {
    ?course ns1:has_content ?practicalContent.
    FILTER(
      CONTAINS(LCASE(?practicalContent), "praktikum") ||
      CONTAINS(LCASE(?practicalContent), "laboratorija") ||
      CONTAINS(LCASE(?practicalContent), "projekat") ||
      CONTAINS(LCASE(?practicalContent), "пројекат") ||
      CONTAINS(LCASE(?practicalContent), "лабораторија") ||
      CONTAINS(LCASE(?practicalContent), "практикум")
    )
    BIND(?content AS ?practicalCourse)
  }
  OPTIONAL {
    ?course ns1:has_content ?theoreticalContent.
    FILTER(
      CONTAINS(LCASE(?theoreticalContent), "teorija") ||
      CONTAINS(LCASE(?theoreticalContent), "теорија")
    )
    BIND(?content AS ?theoreticalCourse)
  }
}
GROUP BY ?program
HAVING (COUNT(?practicalCourse) > COUNT(?theoreticalCourse))
ORDER BY DESC(?practicalDominance)
LIMIT 5
queries.question: Koji smer ima malo teorije a puno praktičnog rada?

queries.query:
PREFIX ns1: <http://example.org/course/>
PREFIX ns2: <http://example.org/program/>

SELECT ?program (COUNT(?mathCourse) AS ?mathCourseCount)
WHERE {
  ?program ns1:has_course ?course.
  ?course ns1:has_content ?content.
  FILTER(
    CONTAINS(LCASE(?content), "algebra") ||
    CONTAINS(LCASE(?content), "matematika") ||
    CONTAINS(LCASE(?content), "analiza") ||
    CONTAINS(LCASE(?content), "већа") ||
    CONTAINS(LCASE(?content), "математика") ||
    CONTAINS(LCASE(?content), "анализа")
  )
  BIND(?content AS ?mathCourse)
}
GROUP BY ?program
HAVING (COUNT(?mathCourse) < 4)
ORDER BY ASC(?mathCourseCount)
LIMIT 10
queries.question: Koji su smerovi koji nemaju puno matematike?

queries.query:
PREFIX ns1: <http://example.org/course/>
PREFIX ns2: <http://example.org/program/>

SELECT ?program
WHERE {
  ?program ns1:has_course ?course.
  ?course ns1:has_content ?content.
  FILTER(
    (CONTAINS(LCASE(?content), "напредни") || CONTAINS(LCASE(?content), "napredni")) &&
    (CONTAINS(LCASE(?content), "програмiranje") || CONTAINS(LCASE(?content), "programiranje"))
  )
}
GROUP BY ?program
ORDER BY ?program
queries.question: Koji smerovi sadrže napredne koncepte programiranja?

queries.query:
PREFIX ns1: <http://example.org/course/>
PREFIX ns2: <http://example.org/program/>
PREFIX ns3: <http://example.org/ka/>

SELECT ?program
WHERE {
  ?program ns1:has_course ?course.
  ?course ns1:has_knowledge_area ?knowledgeArea.
  FILTER(
    ?knowledgeArea = <http://example.org/ka/CE-CAE_Circuits_and_Electronics> ||
    ?knowledgeArea = <http://example.org/ka/CE-ESY_Embedded_Systems> ||
    ?knowledgeArea = <http://example.org/ka/CE-SGP_Signal_Processing>
  )
}
GROUP BY ?program
ORDER BY ?program
queries.question: Koji smerovi se bave elektrotehnikom?
Koliko godina traje smer SIIT?

queries.query:
PREFIX ns1: <http://example.org/course/>
PREFIX ns2: <http://example.org/program/>
PREFIX ns3: <http://example.org/learning_outcome/>

SELECT ?program
WHERE {
  ?program ns1:has_course ?course.
  ?course ns1:has_content ?content.
  ?course ns1:has_learning_outcome ?learningOutcome.
  FILTER(
    (CONTAINS(LCASE(?content), "hardver") || CONTAINS(LCASE(?content), "хардувер") || CONTAINS(LCASE(?content), "robotika") || CONTAINS(LCASE(?content), "роботика") || CONTAINS(LCASE(?content), "robot") || CONTAINS(LCASE(?content), "робот")) &&
    (CONTAINS(LCASE(?learningOutcome), "hardver") || CONTAINS(LCASE(?learningOutcome), "хардувер") || CONTAINS(LCASE(?learningOutcome), "robotika") || CONTAINS(LCASE(?learningOutcome), "роботика") || CONTAINS(LCASE(?learningOutcome), "robot") || CONTAINS(LCASE(?learningOutcome), "робот"))
  )
}
GROUP BY ?program
ORDER BY ?program
queries.question: Na kojem smeru ću imati priliku da programiram robote i da se bolje upoznam sa hardverom?
